2.1.title: Coverage
2.1.content: The policy covers hospitalization expenses including room rent, doctor consultation fees, nursing charges, and pre and post hospitalization expenses as specified in the policy terms.

2.4.title: Exclusions
2.4.content: The policy does not cover cosmetic or aesthetic procedures, self-inflicted injuries, treatment arising from substance abuse, or non-prescribed medical treatments.

4.1.title: Claim Process
4.1.content: Claims must be initiated through the official claims department of the insurer. This assistant can only provide information related to the claim process.

5.1.title: Renewal
5.1.content: The policy can be renewed annually before the expiry date subject to the terms and conditions specified in the policy document.

5.2.title: Policy Validity
5.2.content: The policy is valid for a period of one year from the date of issuance unless renewed as per policy guidelines.
